name: CDN Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: mobile-application-development, iphone, android, blackberry, windows-mobile, application, development, software-company, it-company, software, company, web-development-company
overview:
CDN Solutions Group was founded in 2000, is a one-stop-shop IT Services Provider Company with a proven track record in delivering quality Software Application, Mobile Application and Multimedia Solutions.

A team of 175+ software professionals at our Development Center, in Central India constitute some of the best technical brains. We have an enviable delivery record of over 413+ projects that has enabled us to become technology partners to software development houses worldwide. CDN offers best of the breed customized solutions to clients around the globe.

for more information visit: http://www.cdnsol.com http://www.cdnmobilesolutions.com http://www.cdndesignstudio.com

Client Reviews & Ratings for CDN Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd. - http://www.cdnsol.com/client-testimonials.html
